enum EXTI_LINE_ENUM

EXTI external interrupt line option.

Enumerator:
EXTI_EINT0  External interrupt 0, P2.10
EXTI_EINT1  External interrupt 0, P2.11
EXTI_EINT2  External interrupt 0, P2.12
EXTI_EINT3  External interrupt 0, P2.13

EXTI mode option.

Enumerator:
EXTI_MODE_LEVEL_SENSITIVE  Level sensitivity is selected
EXTI_MODE_EDGE_SENSITIVE  Edge sensitivity is selected

enum EXTI_POLARITY_ENUM

EXTI polarity option.

Enumerator:
EXTI_POLARITY_LOW_ACTIVE_OR_FALLING_EDGE  Low active or falling edge sensitive depending on pin mode
EXTI_POLARITY_HIGH_ACTIVE_OR_RISING_EDGE  High active or rising edge sensitive depending on pin mode
